resources.string:
"Hello! I Hope you likes my work!
But folks, Its take lots of time, bunch of hardwork and plenty of money to do all this stuff So If you like my work and respect it then make a small Donation*, It will Apreceate me for my work and Encourage me to work further. Thank You.
Regards -(DEVELOPER NAME)"
I am unable to Support You(But I like)

"*If You feel unsafe here or not able to donate through mobile, then you can also donate from PC too! Follow this:- 1.Just click on \"View Donation URL\" button. 2.Open same link in browser. 3.A Paypal page will open, fill amount and donate."
